title: PBE Stuff
body:
Hey, I need help downloading the PBE, I really wanna help and do things with the PBE but whenever I try to download it I never get any emails or anything saying that I have been accepted and if I do get accepted how would I go of actually going into the game of PBE. Pls help.

:^                                                                                                                                                          )

replies.body: You can download the client, but you won't be able to login without a PBE account.  An email would only be sent if you have been approved.  I looked into your account and it doesn't look like you've been accepted just yet.  I can't force or expedite an application, or have any info on how to get in beyond our[ PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your application!
Thank you o much now i see :)
